SEARCH
Module org.example.eiscuno
Package org.example.eiscuno.model.player

Interface IPlayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Player
public interface IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the Uno game. Provides methods to interact with the player's hand of cards.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCard(Card card)
    Adds a card to the player's hand.
    Card
    getCard(int index)
    Retrieves a card from the player's hand based on its index.
    ArrayList<Card>
    getCardsPlayer()
    Retrieves all cards currently held by the player.
    void
    removeCard(int index)
    Removes a card from the player's hand based on its index.

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added to the player's hand.

    • getCard

      Card getCard(int index)
      Retrieves a card from the player's hand based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The card at the specified index in the player's hand.

    • getCardsPlayer

      ArrayList<Card> getCardsPlayer()
      Retrieves all cards currently held by the player.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all cards in the player's hand.

    • removeCard

      void removeCard(int index)
      Removes a card from the player's hand based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to remove.
